title: Sanctity
description: Librarian Note: Alternate/new cover edition for ASIN# B00BTQKD9C.  Sanctity is a paranormal romance novel that follows the life of a young girl named Elayna after she forms an unusual friendship with Michael; a man struggling against his nature to do the right thing. It is a story about love and the power it has to transform even when change seems an impossibility.
author: S.M. Bowles
